name: Reflexio (itch) (BoatTK)
description:
A game created by BoatTK and SassyIceCream for the 1-Bit Game Jam (and our second ever game).

Use puddles to your advantage in this short puzzle-platformer.

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

F4 - Toggle Fullscreen

Esc - Quit Game

SFX:

'Rain Inside House Sound' by Mark Diangelo available at http://soundbible.com/2065-Rain-Inside-House.html under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0. Full terms at https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0.
